name: /u/ game /agdg/ dd12 demo
description:
Play as /u/-tan Shizuka and attempt to calm down and seduce angry kouhai at St. Mitchel's catholic school. There are only two encounters so it is very short and I didn't even seal off the level (；ﾟДﾟ).

This was originally a project I used to port collision game for Monogame to Unity so I could improve the danmaku physics in my space jam game. I was going to release this for lewd jam but then had to wait for the recent engine version.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys: Move/Fly
  • Up Arrow: Jump/Transform
  • Down Arrow: Fall through platform
  • R/Backspace: Restart
  • Escape: Quit
